alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pike County through 800 PM EDT... At 733 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coleman, or 12 miles south of Williamson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Phelps around 740 PM EDT. Jamboree and Majestic around 745 PM EDT. Paw Paw around 750 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Argo and Woodman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
